column5: does any one have a source for detailed lake maps of lake st joesph........root bay area? heading up for first time sept 27.......flying out of sioux lookout........thanks

Are you going with Slate Falls Outposts? If so, they will have detailed lake maps for you when you get there. Just be sure to ask. If you indeed are going with Slate Falls, I can personally vouch for them as we are heading up in less than 2 weeks and have been with Slate Falls for about 10 years now. First rate all the way. Enjoy!

Yes we are flying out with Vern.....first time to lake st jo.........what lake you going to?...been going to gull for the last 20 years.......lotsa great memories there....http://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...nada200496.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...nada200493.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...nada200456.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...nada200453.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...nada200431.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...08DSC01664.jpg cheers.......Eric

We are in North Gull this year but have been at South the last several years. Holy High Water!!! When was that? We wanted to try Root Bay as well but it was booked the only time we could go. We leave the 11th to fly out the 13th. Can't wait!!! I'll try to post a trip report as we'll be back before you leave.Enjoy!

the high water was in sept 04..fishing was fantastic.......right around the corner from the cabin.......good luck on your trip....my parents and another couple are leaving tomorrow for root bay cheers.......Eric
